# roadmap-renderer
> Balsamiq to SVG renderer

## Install

Run the below command

```shell
npm install roadmap-renderer
```

## Using

```javascript
import { wireframeJSONToSVG } from 'roadmap-renderer';

wireframeJSONToSVG(roadmapJson, {
  padding: 5,
  fontFamily: 'balsamiq',
  fontURL: '/fonts/balsamiq.woff2' 
});
```
